subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With a second left on the game clock, LeBron James took an inbounds pass and shot over Hedo Turkoglu at the 3-point arc, sending fans into pandemonium.
snippet: With a second left on the game clock, LeBron James took an inbounds pass and shot over Hedo Turkoglu at the 3-point arc, sending fans into pandemonium.
